question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. umbrella
B. chair behind the lady
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The chair behind the lady is clearly positioned further back in the scene than the umbrella, which is closer to the foreground and partially obscures the view of the chair.
